plot: Near-silent and shot via a cell phone, a war veteran observes the world which has been colored by his experiences in Afghanistan.
title: Why Didn't Anybody Tell Me It Would Become This Bad in Afghanistan
plot_es: Near-silent and shot via a cell phone, a war veteran observes the world which has been colored by his experiences in Afghanistan.
original_name: Why Didn't Anybody Tell Me It Would Become This Bad in Afghanistan
plot_en: Near-silent and shot via a cell phone, a war veteran observes the world which has been colored by his experiences in Afghanistan.
